Class DatabaseManager

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.generics.LongPollingBot, org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.generics.TelegramBot

    public class DatabaseManager
extends DaBooking_bot
    This class handles all the database interactions. This uses JDBC-SQLite as a driver

        Returns:

      • viewBookedList

        public java.lang.String viewBookedList(java.lang.Integer User_ID,
                                       java.lang.String viewOrDelete)
        This method is to loop and display a list of booked rooms made by the user
        Parameters:
        User_ID - User's ID
        viewOrDelete - Determine whether user want to view or delete the booking list, the output will be altered slightly based on the String
        Returns:
        return list of booked rooms

      • viewBookedDetails

        public java.lang.String viewBookedDetails(java.lang.Integer Booking_ID)
        This is for the user to view the booked room Details including the booked *room details* and *booking details* Room Details: Room ID, Room Name, Room Description, Maximum Capacity, Room Type Booking Details: Booking ID, Booking DotW, Booking Date, Booking Start Time, Booking End Time, Booking Duration, Booking Purpose
        Parameters:
        Booking_ID - Booking ID
        Returns:
        Return the details

      • deleteBooked

        public java.lang.String deleteBooked(java.lang.Integer Booking_ID,
                                     java.lang.Integer User_ID)
        This method will cancel booking made by the user
        Parameters:
        Booking_ID - Booking ID
        User_ID - User ID, this parameter is added to ensure the booking deleted is really made by the user who login the system
        Returns:
        Return to inform whether the booking is successfully deleted or not
